game.description: Explore the ancient ruins of Eldoria and recover the lost artifact.
game.objective: Recover the lost artifact from the ancient ruins.

tasks.description: Find the entrance to the ruins
tasks.objective: Locate the hidden entrance to the ancient ruins in the forest.

tasks.description: Solve the puzzles inside the ruins
tasks.objective: Solve the intricate puzzles to progress deeper into the ruins.
Locate the chamber where the lost artifact is said to be located and retrieve it.

game.title: The Lost Artifact of Eldoria
